title: Real-time visualization of carbon quantum dots transport in homogeneous and heterogeneous porous media
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00563E, Paper
Ying Zhao, Jian Song, Qingchun Yang, Yuelei Li, Zhuqing Liu, Fan Yang
The widespread applications of carbon quantum dots (CQDs) have attracted much attention. This study presents a novel research system to study the transport and retention of CQDs in homogeneous and...
